title: Ticket #510: USE_VISIBLE_DESKTOP doesn't work
description:
RUST user complains he cannot debug his win32 job using USE_VISIBLE_DESKTOP. Jobs run normally with USE_VISIBLE_DESKTOP = False, exit immediately when USE_VISIBLE_DESKTOP = True.

When testing myself, the user log shows the following for USE_VISIBLE_DESKTOP = True: 

        005 (007.000.000) 05/26 09:44:06 Job terminated.
        (1) Normal termination (return value -1073741502)

which is the same problem reported by the RUST user.
